Parameters: float: the value to initialize the value held in the FloatValueHolder
FloatValueHolder(float).Description: Constructs a holder for a float value that is initialized to the input value.

Parameters: float: float value held in the FloatValueHolder instance
setValue(float).Description: Sets the value held in the FloatValueHolder instance.

Returns: float value held in the FloatValueHolder instance
getValue().Description: Returns the float value held in the FloatValueHolder instance.

FloatValueHolder().Description: Constructs a holder for a float value that is initialized to 0.

ClassDesc: FloatValueHolder holds a float value. FloatValueHolder provides a setter and a getter ( i.e. @B_android#support#animation#FloatValueHolder#setValue_E@ and @B_android#support#animation#FloatValueHolder#getValue_E@) to access this float value. Animations can be performed on a FloatValueHolder instance. During each frame of the animation, the FloatValueHolder will have its value updated via @B_android#support#animation#FloatValueHolder#setValue_E@. The caller can obtain the up-to-date animation value via @B_android#support#animation#FloatValueHolder#getValue_E@.
